name: @jscad/io-utils
description: Utilities for input , output and formats handling for jscad project

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm version patch ; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm version minor ; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm version major ; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags
